snippet: Shares of Ralph Lauren and Chesapeake Energy were rising after corporate moves were announced.
abstract: Stocks rise after following gains in Asia and Europe; positive day ends worst quarter in four years.

headline.main: Market Rallies to Close Out a Weak Quarter
